abstract: Scottish golfer Russell Knox, who is ranked 20th in world but did not play enough events on European Tour to automatically represent Europe at 2016 Ryder Cup, is not selected for team.
lead_paragraph: Knox has struggled with an illness at the Deutsche Bank Championship, after a disappointing Barclays finish and the news he would not be a member of Team Europe for the Ryder Cup.
snippet: Knox has struggled with an illness at the Deutsche Bank Championship, after a disappointing Barclays finish and the news he would not be a member of Team Europe for the Ryder Cup....

headline.main: For Russell Knox, $4.8 Million in Earnings but a Ryder Cup Snub
headline.print_headline: No Room on Ryder Cup Team for Europe’s Top Earner
